message.name: ERR_OTHER_REASON
message.locale: You must enter a 'Comment' when the 'Create Reason' is Other._fr

message.name: ERR_CHANGE_REASON
message.locale: You must enter a 'Comment' when the 'Change Reason' is Other._fr

message.name: ERR_RECEIVED_REQUEST_CREATE_REASON_CANNOT_BE_USED
message.locale: You cannot use Received Request as a 'Create Reason' for the 'Liability Type' of %1s._fr

message.name: ERR_MINISTER_AUTH_CREATE_REASON_CANNOT_BE_USED
message.locale: You cannot use Minister Authorized as a 'Create Reason' for the 'Liability Type' of %1s._fr

message.name: ERR_RECEIVED_REQUEST_CHANGE_REASON_CANNOT_BE_USED
message.locale: You cannot use Received Request as a 'Change Reason' for the 'Liability Type' of %1s._fr

message.name: ERR_UNDUE_HARDSHIP_CHANGE_REASON_CANNOT_BE_USED
message.locale: You cannot use Undue Hardship as a 'Change Reason' for the 'Liability Type' of %1s._fr

message.name: ERR_OVERPAYMENT_CASES_DOES_NOT_EXIST_FOR_PENALTY
message.locale: No Overpayment cases exist for this person._fr
